verses.verse: Now <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7462>kept<s%> the <S%H6629>flock<s%> of <S%H3503>Jethro<s%> his <S%H2859>father<s%> in <S%H2859>law,<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian:<s%> and he <S%H5090>led<s%> the <S%H6629>flock<s%> to the <S%H310>backside<s%> of the <S%H4057>desert,<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> even to <S%H2722>Horeb.<s%>

And the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7200>appeared<s%> to him in a <S%H3827>flame<s%> of <S%H784>fire<s%> out of the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of a <S%H5572>bush:<s%> and he <S%H7200>looked,<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H5572>bush<s%> <S%H1197>burned<s%> with <S%H784>fire,<s%> and the <S%H5572>bush<s%> was not <S%H398>consumed.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> I will <S%H4994>now<s%> <S%H5493>turn<s%> aside, and <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4758>sight,<s%> <S%H4069>why<s%> the <S%H5572>bush<s%> is not <S%H1197>burnt.<s%>

And when the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that he <S%H5493>turned<s%> aside to <S%H7200>see,<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> to him out of the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of the <S%H5572>bush,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%> And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2009>Here<s%> am I.

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> Draw not <S%H7126>near<s%> <S%H1988>here:<s%> <S%H5394>put<s%> off your <S%H5275>shoes<s%> from off your <S%H7272>feet,<s%> for the <S%H4725>place<s%> where <S%H834>on<s%> <S%H5921><s%> you <S%H5975>stand<s%> is <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H127>ground.<s%>

Moreover he <S%H559>said,<s%> I am the <S%H430>God<s%> of your <S%H1>father,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3327>Isaac,<s%> and the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob.<s%> And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5641>hid<s%> his <S%H6440>face;<s%> for he was <S%H3372>afraid<s%> to <S%H5027>look<s%> on <S%H430>God.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> I have surely <S%H7200>seen<s%> the <S%H6040>affliction<s%> of my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> are in <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and have <S%H8085>heard<s%> their <S%H6818>cry<s%> by <S%H6440>reason<s%> of their <S%H5065>taskmasters;<s%> for I <S%H3045>know<s%> their <S%H4341>sorrows;<s%>

And I am <S%H3381>come<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H5337>deliver<s%> them out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H4714>Egyptians,<s%> and to <S%H5927>bring<s%> them up out of that <S%H776>land<s%> to a <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> and a <S%H7342>large,<s%> to a <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H2100>flowing<s%> with <S%H2461>milk<s%> and <S%H1706>honey;<s%> to the <S%H4725>place<s%> of the <S%H3669>Canaanites,<s%> and the <S%H2850>Hittites,<s%> and the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> and the <S%H6522>Perizzites,<s%> and the <S%H2340>Hivites,<s%> and the <S%H2983>Jebusites.<s%>

<S%H6258>Now<s%> therefore, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H6818>cry<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> is <S%H935>come<s%> to me: and I have <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H7200>seen<s%> the <S%H3906>oppression<s%> with <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> <S%H3905>oppress<s%> them.

<S%H3212>Come<s%> <S%H6258>now<s%> therefore, and I will <S%H7971>send<s%> you to <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> that you may <S%H3318>bring<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> my <S%H5971>people<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H4310>Who<s%> am I, that I should <S%H3212>go<s%> to <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and that I should <S%H3318>bring<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt?<s%>

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3588>Certainly<s%> I will be with you; and <S%H2088>this<s%> shall be a <S%H226>token<s%> to you, that I have <S%H7971>sent<s%> you: When you have <S%H3318>brought<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> you shall <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> on <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H2022>mountain.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> when I <S%H935>come<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and shall <S%H559>say<s%> to them, The <S%H430>God<s%> of your <S%H1>fathers<s%> has <S%H7971>sent<s%> me to you; and they shall <S%H559>say<s%> to me, <S%H4100>What<s%> is his <S%H8034>name?<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> shall I <S%H559>say<s%> to them?

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> I <S%H1961>AM<s%> THAT I <S%H1961>AM:<s%> and he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> shall you <S%H559>say<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> I <S%H1961>AM<s%> has <S%H7971>sent<s%> me to you.

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H5750>moreover<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> Thus shall you <S%H559>say<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of your <S%H1>fathers,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3327>Isaac,<s%> and the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> has <S%H7971>sent<s%> me to you: <S%H2088>this<s%> is my <S%H8034>name<s%> for <S%H5769>ever,<s%> and <S%H2088>this<s%> is my <S%H2143>memorial<s%> to all <S%H1755>generations.<s%>

<S%H3212>Go,<s%> and <S%H622>gather<s%> the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> together, and <S%H559>say<s%> to them, The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of your <S%H1>fathers,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> of <S%H3327>Isaac,<s%> and of <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> <S%H7200>appeared<s%> to me, <S%H559>saying,<s%> I have surely <S%H6485>visited<s%> you, and seen that <S%H834>which<s%> is <S%H6213>done<s%> to you in <S%H4714>Egypt:<s%>

And I have <S%H559>said,<s%> I will <S%H5927>bring<s%> you up out of the <S%H6040>affliction<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H3669>Canaanites,<s%> and the <S%H2850>Hittites,<s%> and the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> and the <S%H6522>Perizzites,<s%> and the <S%H2340>Hivites,<s%> and the <S%H2983>Jebusites,<s%> to a <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H2100>flowing<s%> with <S%H2461>milk<s%> and <S%H1706>honey.<s%>

And they shall <S%H8085>listen<s%> to your <S%H6963>voice:<s%> and you shall <S%H935>come,<s%> you and the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and you shall <S%H559>say<s%> to him, The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of the <S%H5680>Hebrews<s%> has <S%H7136>met<s%> with us: and <S%H6258>now<s%> let us <S%H3212>go,<s%> we <S%H4994>beseech<s%> you, <S%H7969>three<s%> days' <S%H3117><s%><S%H1870>journey<s%> into the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> that we may <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God.<s%>
And I am <S%H3045>sure<s%> that the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> will not <S%H5414>let<s%> you <S%H1980>go,<s%> <S%H3808>no,<s%> not by a <S%H2389>mighty<s%> <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

And I will <S%H7971>stretch<s%> out my <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and <S%H5221>smite<s%> <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H6381>wonders<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I will <S%H6213>do<s%> in the <S%H7130>middle<s%> thereof: and <S%H310>after<s%> that he will let you <S%H7971>go.<s%>

And I will <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H2580>favor<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H4714>Egyptians:<s%> and it shall <S%H1961>come<s%> to pass, that, when you <S%H3212>go,<s%> you shall not <S%H3212>go<s%> <S%H7387>empty.<s%>

But every <S%H802>woman<s%> shall <S%H7592>borrow<s%> of her <S%H7934>neighbor,<s%> and of her that <S%H1481>sojournes<s%> in her <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H3627>jewels<s%> of <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and <S%H3627>jewels<s%> of <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and <S%H8071>raiment:<s%> and you shall <S%H7760>put<s%> them on your <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and on your <S%H1323>daughters;<s%> and you shall <S%H5337>spoil<s%> the <S%H4714>Egyptians.<s%>
